name: Cian - A journal app for reflecting on today, discovering tomorrow, and contemplating the future
description: Cian is a new journaling application that combines short-form, social media–style entries with AI dialogue to support reflective thinking. The LLM automatically summarizes what you write and visualizes frequently used words and emotional trends. Through reflective conversations, it helps you deepen your thoughts and suggests your next steps. Whether for everyday notes or as a companion on difficult days, Cian is always there to support your reflections.
